original_title: マスタード・チョコレート
overview: Tsugumi Rinko can't wait to escape the tedium of high school for the challenges and rewards that accompany life at a fine arts college. She only has two problems:  1) She has few social skills and fewer friends.  2) With less than nine months remaining before her crucial admissions test, she has no practical art experience.
title: Mustard Chocolate
